newsitem.title: USA: Dow gains more than 50 points.
newsitem.headline: Dow gains more than 50 points.

text.p: The Dow Jones industrial average gained more than 50 points in early trading Thursday, bouncing back on new buying after three straight sessions of losses.
At 9:45 a.m. EDT, the index of 30 blue-chip issues was up 51.57 points at 7,770.28, which activated the New York Stock Exchange's limits on program trading.
